div.p: Hi. My name is Steve Young, and I'm one
of the ACCESS academic advisors here at DeSales University.
Welcome to the Skylight Lounge here in Dooling Hall.
Dooling Hall, as you know, is the hub of activity for ACCESS students.
The Skylight Lounge here is a great place for you to catch a bite to eat, either before class,
or at the break during your class.
It's also a great place if you're looking to do some last-minute studying before class.
And also to reconnect or get acquainted with your classmates,
socializing before or in between class.
Their hours during the academic year, they're open daily.
And during the summer their hours do vary.
So thanks a lot, and I want to wish you the best of luck with your career here
at DeSales and the ACCESS program.
